title: Native Horticulture Plant Nursery
text: YOU will want to know about this IF: You care about the environment and natural things. You know horticulture and how to make things grow. You are a farmer at heart. You want to make a difference. You are handy, mechanically inclined. You are willing to learn new things. You understand business. You are pleasant and can talk to customers, meet them well and make things happen. You are young enough to handle the transition and time to get established. You are not frightened by work, risk, weather, difficulty and the outdoors. You love to be hands on, in order, make it happen You are physically strong enough to lift and load You have always thought you would want to be in business for yourself someday You will be involved, not an absentee owner And US? We are established for decades as a provider of native plants to the native plant community We are Wholesale only. Do no retail. We have good sized inventories. We have many customers and contracts to grow product We make money, sometimes a lot of money. We have could double in size We don't own land, just rent. We aren't in debt. We are looking for an orderly transition IF YOU are the right person, this deal will be easy to do. I'll make you a offer you cannot refuse. This can be moved since we are on leased space. You will need at least 4 acres, lots of water, somewhere for the water to go and some ground cover. A couple hoop houses wouldn't hurt. WHAT TO DO. Send me a note by email. Tell me a bit about yourself. Tell me what your background is. IF I believe you are not just snooping or a competitor, I will send you more information. AND THEN, if in fact you seem to be the right person, we'll meet. I'll show you everything. NDA of course. This could be the first step to being on your own in an operating business. Financials
